sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Elizabetha quasi viuens Eliza's funerall. A fevve Aprill drops, showred on the hearse of dead Eliza. Or The funerall teares af [sic] a true hearted subiect. By H.P. Petowe, Henry.
[20] p.
Printed by E. Allde for M. Lawe, dvvelling, in Paules Church-yard, neere vnto Saint Austens gate, London : 1603.
Dedication signed: Henry Petowe. In verse. Signatures: A-B⁴ C² . In this edition, partly printed from the standing type of STC 19803.5, title page line 8 has "Subiect". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Elizabetha quasi viuens Eliza's funerall. A fevve Aprill drops, showred on the hearse of dead Eliza. Or The funerall teares af [sic] a true hearted subiect. By H.P. Petowe, Henry.
[20] p.
Printed by E. Allde for M. Lawe, dvvelling, in Paules Church-yard, neere vnto Saint Austens gate, London : 1603.
Dedication signed: Henry Petowe. In verse. Signatures: A-B⁴ C² . In this edition, partly printed from the standing type of STC 19803.5, title page line 8 has "Subiect". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
M. Lawe
E. Allde
Paules Church-yard, neere vnto Saint Austens gate
